mapper.select: select * from hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list where warning_no=${wid};
select * from hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list where eid = #{eid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and is_deal in (0,2) limit 2;
select * from hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list where eid = #{ID} and warning_type = '${wtype}' and is_deal in (0,2) ;

select w.*,p.protocol_node as protocol_node,e.site_code as site_code,e.device_code as device_code FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list w LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_protocol p on w.warning_type = p.protocol_name LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_efm_device e on w.efm_id = e.id where w.warning_index=0 and w.is_deal in (0,2)

select w.*,p.protocol_node as protocol_node,e.site_code as site_code,e.device_code as device_code FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list w LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_protocol p on w.warning_type = p.protocol_name LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_efm_device e on w.efm_id = e.id where w.warning_index=0 and w.is_deal in (0,2) order by w.warning_no desc limit ${limits};

select w.*,p.protocol_node as protocol_node,e.site_code as site_code,e.device_code as device_code FROM hixent_arc_warning_list w LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_protocol p on w.warning_type = p.protocol_name LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_efm_device e on w.efm_id = e.id where w.warning_index=0 and w.is_deal in (0,2)
and warning_time >= '${time1}'
and '${time2}' >= warning_time
order by w.warning_time desc ;

select w.*,p.protocol_node as protocol_node,e.site_code as site_code,e.device_code as device_code FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list w LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_protocol p on w.warning_type = p.protocol_name LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_efm_device e on w.efm_id = e.id where w.warning_index=0 and w.is_deal in (0,2)
and warning_time >= '${time1}'
and '${time2}' >= warning_time
order by w.warning_time desc limit ${limits};

INSERT INTO hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list (eid,warning_type,warning_time,address,lng_bmap,lat_bmap,warning_index) VALUES ('${ID}','${wType}',${wTime},'${address}',${latBmap},${lngBmap},${eType});
update hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list set is_deal = 1,dispatch_time =${dtime} where warning_no = ${id};
mapper.update: UPDATE hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warn_deal_feedback HAWDF SET HAWDF.defe_is_audit=2 WHERE HAWDF.defe_id=#{id}

UPDATE hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list HAWL SET HAWL.is_deal=1 WHERE HAWL.warning_no=(SELECT HAWDF.defe_warn_id FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warn_deal_feedback HAWDF WHERE HAWDF.defe_id=#{id})
mapper.select: SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'hixent_arc_system' AND TABLE_NAME LIKE "hixent_efm_log_%";
SELECT * FROM ${tableName} WHERE id>0 order by id desc limit 1
mapper.update: UPDATE hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list SET isDispatch = 1 WHERE warning_no=#{warnId}
mapper.select: SELECT dis_id FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_dispach_order WHERE dis_warn_id=#{warnId}

SELECT HAWDF.*,HAWL.warning_time,HAP.account,HAP.mobile,HAPT.protocol_node, GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT HAFL.filePath) filePath FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warn_deal_feedback HAWDF RIGHT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list HAWL ON HAWL.warning_no=HAWDF.defe_warn_id LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_folder HAF ON HAF.folderId=HAWDF.defe_img_folderId LEFT JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_file HAFL ON HAFL.folderId=HAF.folderId JOIN hixent_app_user HAP ON HAP.id=HAWDF.defe_appUser_id JOIN hixent_arc_protocol HAPT ON HAPT.protocol_name=HAWL.warning_type WHERE HAWDF.defe_warn_id=#{warnId}
mapper.update: UPDATE hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list HAWL SET HAWL.isReset=1,HAWL.is_deal=1,HAWL.dispatch_time=#{time} WHERE (HAWL.efm_id=#{deviceId} OR HAWL.eid=#{deviceId}) AND HAWL.is_deal IN (0,2)
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(HAWL.warning_no) FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list HAWL JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_efm_device HAED ON HAED.id=HAWL.efm_id JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAED.site_code WHERE HAWL.is_deal IN(0,2) AND HAWL.etype=1
AND HAWL.warning_index=#{warnIndex}

SELECT COUNT(HAWL.warning_no) FROM hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_warning_list HAWL JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_equipment_info HAEI ON HAWL.eid=HAEI.id JOIN hixent_arc_system.hixent_arc_site HAS ON HAS.site_code=HAEI.site_code WHERE HAWL.is_deal IN(0,2)
AND HAWL.warning_index=#{warnIndex}

sql.if: AND substring(HAS.site_code,1,2)=(SELECT HAPR.province_code FROM hixent_arc_province HAPR WHERE HAPR.id=#{provinceId})
AND substring(HAS.site_code,3,2)=(SELECT HAA.area_code FROM hixent_arc_area HAA WHERE HAA.id=#{areaId} AND HAA.pid=#{provinceId})
